thread.title: BRIEF-CVS Group Raises 60 Mln Pounds Through Placing​

title: BRIEF-CVS Group Raises 60 Mln Pounds Through Placing​
text: February 16, 2018 / 5:41 PM / in 36 minutes BRIEF-CVS Group Raises 60 Mln Pounds Through Placing​ Reuters Staff Feb 16 (Reuters) - Cvs Group Plc: * ‍CONFIRMATION OF SUCCESSFUL £60 MILLION PLACING​ * ‍SUCCESSFULLY RAISED A TOTAL OF APPROXIMATELY £60 MILLION (BEFORE EXPENSES) BY MEANS OF AN ACCELERATED BOOKBUILD​ * SAYS IN CONNECTION WITH PLACING, COMPANY WILL ISSUE 5.6 MILLION NEW ORDINARY SHARES AT A PRICE OF 1075 PENCE EACH * CVS GROUP - NET PROCEEDS OF PLACING WILL BE USED TO PAY DOWN DEBT, CREATE ADDITIONAL HEADROOM TO HELP FUND EXPECTED FUTURE ACQUISITIONS IN UK AND NETHERLANDS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
